msg: Transferred from the Adobe Open Source Subversion Repository

Add Spark download progress bar. This one operates a bit differently than the Halo version. When the file is being downloaded, the track expands. When the app is initializing, the bar expands in the track. It does not contain any text.
The Halo DLPB is still available. If you want to use it, add 'preloader="mx.preloaders.DownloadProgressBar"' to your Application tag.
Doc: The new preloaderBaseColor property added to both Application classes includes a first pass at ASDoc comments.
Transferred from the Adobe Open Source Subversion Repository
Implement backgroundColor property using a uint instead of a style.
Updated Spark Application and Spark Window.
Transferred from the Adobe Open Source Subversion Repository
Show disabled look when the application is disabled.
Set the Spark ApplicationSkin to use alpha="0.5" when the application is disabled.
Removed setting the name property in the Halo Application constructor and the Spark Application constructor. The name set there is overwritten in the FlexSprite constructor.
Transferred from the Adobe Open Source Subversion Repository
1st pass of rename according to the spec http://opensource.adobe.com/wiki/display/flexsdk/Dropping+the+Fx+Prefix

Flex now requires CSS Style declarations to declare @namespace rules and disambiguate between halo and spark components using CSS 3 namespace prefixes on type selectors. At compile time, this namespace information will be used to map type names to qualified ActionScript class names. At runtime, type selectors are matched on qualified ActionScript class name (for example mx.controls.Button rather than just Button). Flex 3 applications must be compiled with -compatibility-version=3.0.0 to get unqualified CSS type selector behavior.
QE: Yes, this build may help in updating test cases to use the new namespaces and class names.
